sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Center for Geographic Information Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Center for Geographic Information Act.

sections.heading: Definitions.  As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Illinois Center for Geographic Information
sections.text: Subject to appropriation, the Illinois Center for Geographic Information is created within the Prairie Research Institute at the University of Illinois. The general management, control, and operation of the Center shall be within the University of Illinois

sections.heading: Stakeholder engagement. The Center shall engage with interested stakeholders throughout the State representing local, regional, and federal agencies; professional associations; academic institutions; public utilities; and private sector companies, enterprises, or businesses
sections.text: Stakeholder engagement. The Center shall engage with interested stakeholders throughout the State representing local, regional, and federal agencies; professional associations; academic institutions; public utilities; and private sector companies, enterprises, or businesses.

sections.heading: Data sharing. The Center shall have the authority to initiate and enter into intergovernmental data sharing agreements on behalf of the State for the benefit of geographic information coordination
sections.text: Data sharing. The Center shall have the authority to initiate and enter into intergovernmental data sharing agreements on behalf of the State for the benefit of geographic information coordination.

sections.heading: The Illinois Geographic Information Council Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Illinois Geographic Information Council Act is repealed.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
